titleStmt.title: Elvānāśūr, Grāmārdhanātha Temple, time of Vijayarāya Mahārāya

msContents.summary: It states that, as a result of the collection of kāṇikkai from the ryots of the Right-hand and Left-hand classes by the officers of state on each change of regime or administration, the former became impoverished and ran away from their homes to other kingdoms consequently worship and festivals in temples ceased and the land became infested with disease causing intense mental anguish to the people.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē.

svasti śrīmaṉ mahā-maṇṭaliīcura Ariyarāya vipāṭaṉ pāṣaikku tappuvarāyar kaṇṭaṉ muū-v-arāyar kaṇṭaṉ kaṇṭa-nāṭu koṇṭu koṇṭa-nāṭu koṭātāṉ
satu-samuttirāti-pati keca-veēṭṭai kaṇṭ' aruḷiya śrī viīra-pratāpa vicaiya rāya mahā-rāyar piṟutu-v-irācciyam paṇṇi Aruḷā niṉṟa kṣayasaṅ
vaṟsarattu tulā-nāyaṟṟu pūṟuva-pakṣattu veḷḷi-k-kiḻamaiyum tecamiyum peṟṟa Aviṭṭattu nāḷ vaḻutilampaṭṭu cāvaṭi nāṭum kaāraṇikkarum parivāramum toṇṭaimāṉār kacciyarāyar kacciyarāyarum kūṭi iruntu Irāyar
Irāyatappiṟamā-ṇattukku nākaraca Uṭaiyar nirupa-p paṭi Iṉa-vari Iṭaṅkai-vari kaḻittu kallu-veṭṭivitta paṭi Irācciyattil valaṅkai Iṭaṅkai Inta Iraṇṭu vakaiyil kuṭikaḷaiyum piṟatāṉikaḷ maṉmantaraṅkaḷ toōṟum kāṇikkai ko
ṇṭu Ittāleē kuṭikaḷ Uḷḷatu nalaṅki puṟa irācciyameē Oṭi-p poōy Ittāleē teēva-tāṉaṅkaḷ pūcai puṉaskāram tiru-nāḷum kulaintu Irācciyam viyātiyum Āy maṉittar Uḷḷam cettu nalaṅkiṉapaṭiāle Intacceyti Irāyar tiruvuḷḷam paṟṟi Aruḷi
valaṅkai y-iṭaṅkaiyil Uṇṭu Āṉa kuṭikaḷukkum kāṇikkai koḷḷa-k kaṭavat' alla Eṉṟu Aṇṇappa Uṭaiyaṟku Irāyar Irāyatam tiru-vuḷḷam-paṟṟi Aruḷiya Aḷavil Inta Iṉa-variyum Iṭaṅkai-variyum kaḻittu Aṇṇappa Uṭaiyar cila Iṭa
ttukku-k kallu-veṭṭuvittu cila-cila Iṭattukku-k kallu-veṭṭuviyāta paṭi y-Āleē Inta-c ceyti nākaraca Uṭaiyaṟku viṇṇappañ ceyta paṭiyāleē Immatiyā tikku nākaraca Uṭaiyar nirupam tarukaiyil Iṉ-ṉāḷ mutalukku valaṅkai
Iṭaṅkaiyil palakuṭikaḷukkum Iṉavari Iṭaṅkaivari Eṉṟu koḷḷa-k kaṭavat' alla-v-ākavum Itukku Irāca-karattukku Uṭkuṭuttu kalaivu vicārittavaṉ civa-t-turoōki paṭṭatum paṭṭu
